trans-unit.source: Provides a service for registering event handlers for component events.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en tjeneste for å registrere hendelsesbehandling for komponenten hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The event binding service provides a way to link an event handler with a component event from designer code.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten hendelse bindingen kan koble en hendelsesbehandling med en komponent hendelse fra designer-kode.

trans-unit.source: To link an event handler with a component event using the IEventBindingService, you must first obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> for the event of the component you intend to link.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil koble en hendelsesbehandling med en komponent hendelse ved hjelp av IEventBindingService, må du først skaffe en <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>for hendelsen av komponenten du skal koble.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The IEventBindingService provides methods that can convert an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> which you can use to configure the event with an event handler method name.
trans-unit.target: IEventBindingService inneholder metoder kan konvertere en <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>som du kan bruke til å konfigurere hendelsen med en metodenavnet på hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object provides a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A> method that you can use to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> containing <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> objects for each event of a component.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>-objektet har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A>metode som du kan bruke til å hente en <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>som inneholder <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>objekter for hver hendelse for en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A> methods of the IEventBindingService return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for each <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> passed to either method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A>metoder for å gå tilbake IEventBindingService en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>for hver <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>sendt til enten-metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> returned from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A> has a property type of string.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>returnert fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A>har en egenskapstype streng.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IEventBindingService.GetEventProperty%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: You can set this string to a value that indicates the name of the event-handler method to link the event with using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.SetValue%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi denne strengen til en verdi som angir navnet på hendelsesbehandlingen metoden til å koble hendelsen med ved hjelp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.SetValue%2A>metoden for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a unique name for an event-handler method for the specified component and event.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et unikt navn for en hendelsesbehandlingen metoden for den angitte komponenten og arrangementer.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a name that is unique from any other method name in the user's source code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer et navn som er unikt fra andre metodenavnet i brukerens kildekode.

trans-unit.source: The component instance the event is connected to.
trans-unit.target: Komponentforekomsten hendelsen er koblet til.

trans-unit.source: The event to create a name for.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen for å opprette et navn for.

trans-unit.source: The recommended name for the event-handler method for this event.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalte navnet for hendelsesbehandlingen metoden for denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of event-handler methods that have a method signature compatible with the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av hendelsesbehandlingen metoder som har en metodesignatur som er kompatibel med den angitte hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Each string in the collection is the name of a method that has a method signature compatible with the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Hver streng i samlingen er navnet på en metode som har en metodesignatur som er kompatibel med den angitte hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event to get the compatible event-handler methods for.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen for å hente kompatibel hendelsesbehandlingen metoder for.

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings.
trans-unit.target: En samling av strenger.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> for the event that the specified property descriptor represents, if it represents an event.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> for hendelsen som representerer den angitte egenskap beskrivelsen, hvis den representerer en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: The property that represents an event.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen som representerer en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> for the event that the property represents, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property does not represent an event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> for hendelsen som representerer egenskapen, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis egenskapen ikke representerer en hendelse.

trans-unit.source: Converts a set of event descriptors to a set of property descriptors.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer et sett med hendelsen beskrivelser til et sett med beskrivelser av egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Each returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A> of string.
trans-unit.target: Hver returnerte <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A>av streng.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The events to convert to properties.
trans-unit.target: Hendelser som brukes til å konvertere til egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects that describe the event set.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hendelsen settet.

trans-unit.source: Converts a single event descriptor to a property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en beskrivelse for én hendelse til en beskrivelse for egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A> of string.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A>strengen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor.PropertyType%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The event to convert.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that describes the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> som beskriver hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Displays the user code for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Viser brukerkode for designer.

trans-unit.source: This method displays the code editor.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser koderedigeringsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the code is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koden vises. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the user code for the designer at the specified line.
trans-unit.target: Viser brukerkode for designer i den angitte linjen.

trans-unit.source: This method displays the code editor and positions the cursor on the specified line.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser koderedigeringsprogrammet og markøren på den angitte linjen.

trans-unit.source: The line number to place the caret on.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret skal plasseres i synlig på.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the code is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koden vises. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the user code for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Viser brukerkode for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method displays the code editor and positions the cursor on the line that the specified event is declared on.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden viser koderedigeringsprogrammet og markøren på linjen som hendelsen er deklarert på.

trans-unit.source: The component that the event is connected to.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som hendelsen er koblet til.

trans-unit.source: The event to display.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the code is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis koden vises. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
